Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R45' Ranged touch inflicts 1d3 HP

Shout (W4 Evoc): R30' Cone inflicts 5d6 HP and deafness for 2d6 rd (DC 13 Fort half damage, no deafness)
Slow (W3 Tran): R45' 9 creatures in 15' radius take one action per rd, suffer -1 AC, attack, and Reflex, and slowed to half Speed for 9 rd (DC 12 Will neg)
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R190' Fog in 20' radius obscures vision and causes nausea for 1d4+1 rd (no attacks or spells) (DC 12 Fort neg) for 9 rd
